episode: My husband was away on a month long business trip, and I spent a lot of time on my own.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My husband is away on a month long business trip. It has been tough having him away for so long!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must be really hard on you. Missing him?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, missing him greatly! We usually spend a lot of time together.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's tough when routines are disrupted. Staying busy helping?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have been trying to keep busy with things, but I still have felt very lonely a lot of the time.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Loneliness can be tough to shake. Counting down the days until he's back?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Absolutely! It's still another week. Any suggestions for things I can do to make the time pass faster?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Try picking up a new hobby or watching a new TV series.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A tv series is a great idea. But choosing something new is so hard!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What kind of shows do you usually like?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I really like emotional dramas.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those can be really engaging. Have you seen "This Is Us"?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is one of my favorite shows! I am looking for something similar. Any recommendations?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You might like "Parenthood" or "Brothers & Sisters".

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was thinking of Brothers and Sisters. Is it any good?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great! Family drama, relatable characters... you'll probably love it!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It does sound like something I would like. Maybe I should start that tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Give it a try! I think it'll be a great distraction from the loneliness.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah... get lost in someone else's drama!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Exactly! Sometimes that's just what we need.
